about_the_game:
It’s classy. It’s chic. It’s the kind of finery Sackboy needs for his ever-so-posh evening parties.

Direct from Craftworld’s high street boutiques, this stunning collection includes a host of clothing options for the snappy dresser.

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
detailed_description:
It’s classy. It’s chic. It’s the kind of finery Sackboy needs for his ever-so-posh evening parties.

Direct from Craftworld’s high street boutiques, this stunning collection includes a host of clothing options for the snappy dresser.

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

name: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - Fancy Clothing Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 @ 2.7GHz, AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K @ 3.5GHz AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX580
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)

short_description: It’s classy. It’s chic. It’s the kind of finery Sackboy needs for his ever-so-posh evening parties. Direct from Craftworld’s high street boutiques, this stunning collection includes a host of clothing options for the snappy dresser. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
